title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, September 13, 2021
description: "My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art."-- Clara Schumann, pianist and composer. Born Clara Wieck on this day in 1819.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art."-- Clara Schumann, pianist and composer. Born Clara Wieck on this day in 1819.
